title: bugsplat after ascension
body: Just played a game of ascension, when the game ended every player got bugsplat. Pls fix

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you provide more information on the issue? Have you been able to reproduce it?

If not, it's possible it was just a random once off, these happen sometimes.

If you are able to reproduce it reliably and are sure it's not an issue with YOUR install (ie; affects everyone in the game) then please [post a bug report over on the NA boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).

Before posting be sure to read the [How to Report a Game Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug) thread to ensure your report will be up to scratch.
Luckily, it seemed to be a one off issue that affected all of us, haven't seen it since.
